title: Getting started with Netty
content: Netty is a client/server framework that provides a simplified layer over NIO networking. This makes it a good candidate to create low-level nonblocking network applications. Overview of Netty Before we begin with a practical example, letâ€™s see the main highlights of Netty framework: Ease of use: Netty is simpler to use than plain Java NIO ...
